name: Shido Bridged USDC
description: Shido Bridged USDC is native stablecoin USDC issued by Circle bridged to the Shido Network. USD Coin (USDC) is a digital currency that is fully backed by U.S. dollar assets. USDC is a tokenized U.S. dollar, with the value of one USDC coin pegged as close to the value of one U.S. dollar as it can get. The value of USDC is designed to remain stable, making USDC a stablecoin. Bridging is powered by the Shido Gateway in collaboration with Wanchain.
